name: 'A-PROPOS DE...' (newspaper columns)
description: The writing exercise of 1 to 3 newspaper columns per week not exceeding 15 lines, faxed each week to chief editors of the L'Est RÃ©publicain newspaper (from January 24, 2004 to April 21, 2005) where I was a local press correspondent for a while.  Never published: 'not sales-orientated enough for a local newspaper that wants, hears talking about people by name' said the publication editors. I continued to write these columns during the other 8 months after their refusal, continuing to fax them to the editorial staff. Language: only in french. Number of columns: 41. PDF: 44 pages.
